aRchaic
  • Reference
  • Articles

Introduction

aRchaic is a R/python software package developed by Kushal Dey and Hussein Al Asadi in collaboration with Matthew Stephens and John Novembre.It is targeted towards exploratory analysis, clustering and summary visualization of patterns of DNA damage and other mutational profiles in large scale ancient DNA data.

Overview

Leave an issue in our Github page or contact us : kkdey@uchicago.edu, halasadi@uchicago.edu
